resources.name: Nihongo con Teppei
resources.description: Daily Japanese podcast for beginners with slow, clear speech.
resources.descriptionLong: Nihongo con Teppei is a popular podcast for Japanese learners featuring daily episodes spoken in slow, clear Japanese. Teppei discusses various topics in simple language, making it perfect for beginners to practice listening comprehension. The podcast has versions for different levels.
resources.notes: Multiple versions available for different levels.

resources.name: Learn Japanese Pod
resources.description: Structured Japanese lessons in podcast format.
resources.descriptionLong: Learn Japanese Pod offers structured Japanese lessons covering grammar, vocabulary, and conversation. Each episode focuses on specific topics with clear explanations and example dialogues. Great for learning on the go.
resources.priceDetails: Free episodes available. Premium for full access.

resources.name: JapanesePod101 Podcast
resources.description: Extensive podcast library with lessons for all levels.
resources.descriptionLong: JapanesePod101's podcast offers thousands of audio lessons for all levels. Episodes cover grammar, vocabulary, culture, and conversation with native speaker hosts. The extensive library ensures there's always something new to learn.
resources.priceDetails: Some free content. Full access requires subscription.
resources.notes: Huge library but can be overwhelming.

resources.name: Sakura Tips
resources.description: Japanese podcast covering culture and language tips.
resources.descriptionLong: Sakura Tips is a Japanese learning podcast that combines language lessons with cultural insights. Episodes cover useful expressions, cultural topics, and practical Japanese for various situations.
resources.notes: Good mix of language and culture content.

resources.name: Bilingual News
resources.nameJa: バイリンガルニュース
resources.description: News discussion podcast in Japanese and English.
resources.descriptionLong: Bilingual News features discussions of current events and interesting topics in both Japanese and English. The hosts naturally switch between languages, making it accessible for intermediate learners while providing exposure to natural Japanese conversation.
resources.notes: Great for transitioning to native content.

resources.name: Nihongo Switch
resources.descriptionLong: Nihongo Switch is designed for intermediate Japanese learners, featuring conversations on various topics with transcripts available. The natural but accessible speech helps bridge the gap between textbook Japanese and native content.

resources.name: Rebuild.fm
resources.description: Tech podcast in Japanese for advanced learners.
resources.descriptionLong: Rebuild.fm is a popular Japanese tech podcast discussing technology, programming, and industry news. While not designed for learners, it's excellent for advanced students interested in tech vocabulary and natural Japanese conversation.

resources.name: YuYu Japanese Podcast
resources.nameJa: ゆうゆう日本語ポッドキャスト
resources.description: Conversational Japanese podcast for intermediate learners.
resources.descriptionLong: YuYu Japanese Podcast features natural conversations in Japanese on everyday topics. The hosts speak at a natural pace but clearly, making it suitable for intermediate learners looking to improve listening comprehension.

resources.name: Learn Japanese with Noriko
resources.description: Japanese podcast with clear speech for learners.
resources.descriptionLong: Learn Japanese with Noriko features episodes spoken in clear, learner-friendly Japanese. Noriko discusses various topics while keeping the language accessible, making it great for building listening skills.

resources.name: News in Slow Japanese
resources.description: Japanese news delivered at a slower pace for learners.
resources.descriptionLong: News in Slow Japanese presents current events and news stories in Japanese at a slower, more comprehensible pace. Great for learners who want to stay informed while practicing listening skills.
resources.priceDetails: Some free content. Premium for full access.
resources.notes: Good for news vocabulary and listening practice.
